meta.name: description
meta.content: The Students of Gonzales Unified School District are the most precious resource of our community. We believe that by building strong relationships among all stakeholders, providing relevant 21st Century learning, and fostering a nurturing school climate, ALL of our students will succeed and thrive.

li.a: Crisis Text Line serves anyone, in any type of crisis, via TEXT

h3.a: Governing Board Meeting Agenda (Current) - Agenda (Reciente) Para La Reunión De La Mesa Directiva

div.div: Emergency Board Meeting Minutes - March 13, 2020 (see "files" below)

Para informacion adicional, contacte a Sofia Ramirez, Secretaria Administrativa al (831) 675-0100 extension 8110

h3.a: GUSD Covid-19 Notice for Parent of SWDs
Monterey County Extends School Closures / El Condado de Monterey Extiende la Fecha del Cierre de las Escuelas

div.div: Please read the attached letter regarding: Monterey County Extends School Closures Por favor lea la carta adjunta sobre: El Condado de Monterey Extiende la Fecha del Cierre de las Escuelas

h3.a: GUSD was notified that CDE is recommending school facilities be closed through June 30, 2020. / GUSD fue notificado de que CDE recomienda que las instalaciones escolares estén cerradas hasta el 30 de junio del 2020.

div.div: Please read the attached letter for more information. / Por favor lea la carta adjunta para mas informacion.
